title: Au Weather Classic
summary: Australian BOM weather app with the original Au Weather interface.
description: Simple, concise, Australian weather ad supported app:* BOM Observations and forecasts* Widgets (JB+ lockscreenenabled): -2x1 customisable -4x1 widget with 3 day forecast, pressure, wind and UV (where available) -4x2 widget with 3 day forecast -4x2 clock widget* Temperature in status bar (black,white, boxed or colour via widget)* Use nearest weather station or select specific from over 750 BOM weather stations* UV index & warnings (where available)* Radar loop (for current station where available)* Share weather* Temperature/pressure graph for last 24 hours (where available)* Last 24hr observations (where available)* Favourites list* Weather warnings (from details menu)* Android Wear notification (Android 4.3+ only via widget)* Sony SmartWatch 2 companion extension available - search Google Play for Au Weather SWXNOTES: * This app only displays weather for Australian BOM weather stations!* Custom ROMs are not supported (but mostly work) - ad-blocking will result in annoying message.* This is app is for the nostalgic user: users are encouraged to switch to Au Weather Free (and is recommended_If you experience issues with the app, please a) check the FAQs (see Help menu) or b) email support@tomfusion.com Made in Australia: Tomfusion is Australian owned and operated.Email support@tomfusion.com with for support -> feedback and suggestions welcome.User comments are not reviewed. However, every email sent to support is read.Feature graphic adapted from the original by Bidgee (Own work) [CC-BY-3.0 (http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0)], via Wikimedia Commons
descriptionHTML:
Simple, concise, Australian weather ad supported app:
* BOM Observations and forecasts
* Widgets (JB+ lockscreenenabled):
-2x1 customisable
-4x1 widget with 3 day forecast, pressure, wind and UV (where available)
-4x2 widget with 3 day forecast
-4x2 clock widget
* Temperature in status bar (black,white, boxed or colour via widget)
* Use nearest weather station or select specific from over 750 BOM weather stations
* UV index & warnings (where available)
* Radar loop (for current station where available)
* Share weather
* Temperature/pressure graph for last 24 hours (where available)
* Last 24hr observations (where available)
* Favourites list
* Weather warnings (from details menu)
* Android Wear notification (Android 4.3+ only via widget)
* Sony SmartWatch 2 companion extension available - search Google Play for Au Weather SWX

NOTES:
* This app only displays weather for Australian BOM weather stations!
* Custom ROMs are not supported (but mostly work) - ad-blocking will result in annoying message.
* This is app is for the nostalgic user: users are encouraged to switch to Au Weather Free (and is recommended_

If you experience issues with the app, please
a) check the FAQs (see Help menu) or
b) email support@tomfusion.com

Made in Australia: Tomfusion is Australian owned and operated.

Email support@tomfusion.com with for support -> feedback and suggestions welcome.

User comments are not reviewed. However, every email sent to support is read.

Feature graphic adapted from the original by Bidgee (Own work) [CC-BY-3.0 (http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0)], via Wikimedia Commons
comments: Radar won't work. That's it, otherwise great info. Fix this you get 5 stars.
Love the older app plz dont change it
has issues has location issues. coconut island ? fairly sure thats not in Adelaide. also status bar temp not working in this version.have used this app for ages very dissapointed with it now
Battery drain Nice to have current temperature on status bar, but this app drained half of my battery in just 5 hours :(
Thank you, thank you THANK YOU! Keeping the old app was the best idea, not a big fan of the new one and am very happy with the old one. Smart move guys!
Annoying Keep adding a random destination I did not add. When removing it, another random comes up. Too annoying. Done
recentChanges: * Fix app icon size on some devices
* Radar: select ranges & nearby (below radar loop)
